default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: ...Who is it this time? Stop there, back off... I said back off!

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: I've gotten stronger? ...Oi, you. What have you done to me!

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Rabbit, for you. You help me improve, and I bring you meat.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Stay close, something's up.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Extra meat for dinner! We made a deal.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: That doesn't count. One more round.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Too late to run away, prey!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Hmm...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Ooh-eh? Ooh-eh-ee-ooh... Oh, it's you. Nothing, I'm just chatting with Pippy.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Never slip up in the Rust, or... there will be trouble.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Money... Tell me what it is? Why does everyone want it?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Pippy is not my pet. It's my lunch. Too bad it's too fat, too greasy to eat.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Hey! What's that thing? It's... eating trash? I-it's coming at me! A robot vacâ€”what? M-make it go away!

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: They used to call me a stray, one without a home. That's not me anymore.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I'll go wherever you go. If you leave without me, I'll go out and find you.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: You're different from other humans. How... I can't put it into words. It's a hunch.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Oi! Oi? You can doze off like that? ...Just like Pippy.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: What are you doing?! I'm not a dog!

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Why are you staring at me? What do you want!

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: You... You're not coming?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Here, the stuff.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Boring.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: If I win, extra meat for dinner.

summer_splash.title: Obtain Attire
summer_splash.text: I didn't want to come... but Pippy loves it here. Emmm... Why do I need to change my clothes to play in the water?

summer_splash.title: Level Up
summer_splash.text: A water fight? I won't lose.

summer_splash.title: Greeting
summer_splash.text: You want to play in the water, too? Here, take this horse with a horn. It can float.

summer_splash.title: Ordinary Contact 1
summer_splash.text: Oh-eh-ee-ooh-ee (Talking to Pippy)...Pippy says these colorful things look pretty.

summer_splash.title: Ordinary Contact 2
summer_splash.text: I'm not playing with it. I'm washing it clean! ...So that I can eat it later.

summer_splash.title: Idle
summer_splash.text: Hmm... The water here is a lot better than the dirty Rust...

summer_splash.title: Annoyed
summer_splash.text: Hey, quit splashing around! Water's getting into my eyes!

summer_splash.title: Special Attention
summer_splash.text: My pants got a bit wet, that's all. Why are you staring at me?
